column4: Hey geys, I installed unbuntu x64 on my usb external hd, everything installed fine but when ubuntu starts to load, I get an ''error 2'' message, any idea what wrong ?
Hey geys, I installed unbuntu x64 on my usb external hd, everything installed fine but when ubuntu starts to load, I get an ''error 2'' message, any idea what wrong ?
